about_the_game:
Jolly Rogers: Pirates Rumble - Engage in Swashbuckling Arena Battles!

Ahoy, me hearties! Prepare to embark on an exhilarating voyage across the seven seas in Jolly Rogers: Pirates Rumble, where action-packed battles and treacherous waters await! Rally your crew, grab your controllers, and dive into thrilling local multiplayer combat for up to 4 players, each controlling a unique pirate armed with extraordinary abilities ready to turn the tide of battle in a single stroke.

Discover a crew of hilarious pirates, each boasting their own ultimate ability capable of shifting the balance of power in your favor. Whether it's sending adversaries plummeting off the map or outmaneuvering them with cunning tactics, victory awaits those daring enough to seize it!

Select your game mode and set sail for adventure amidst a variety of dynamic maps. Plunge into the chaos of Free For All mayhem, where every pirate fights for their share of the plunder. Or join forces with a matey for Team Deathmatch and conquer the opposition as a unified crew. Seek glory as the undisputed King in King of the Map mode, or strategize your way to victory in the classic Capture the Flag.

But beware, matey! The seas are fraught with peril, from treacherous traps to cunning adversaries. Navigate through hazardous environments while seizing fruit power-ups to gain the upper hand. Freeze your foes with the Ice Fruit or set them ablaze with the Fire Fruit - the choice is yours, but choose wisely!

With its intuitive controls and dynamic gameplay, Jolly Rogers: Pirates Rumble promises endless hours of swashbuckling fun for pirates of all skill levels. So hoist the Jolly Roger, prepare for battle, and let the rumble begin!

Key Features:
Local multiplayer madness: Challenge your friends to thrilling battles on the same screen and prove who's the mightiest pirate of them all.
Unique pirate powers: Master each pirate's ultimate ability to secure victory and become a legend of the high seas.
Diverse game modes: From chaotic Free For All to strategic Capture the Flag, there's a mode for every pirate's taste.
Dynamic maps: Navigate through perilous traps and obstacles while seizing fruit power-ups to gain the upper hand.
Easy to learn, hard to master: With intuitive controls and addictive gameplay, Jolly Rogers: Pirates Rumble is perfect for players of all ages and skill levels.

Prepare to embark on an unforgettable adventure and carve your name into pirate legend in Jolly Rogers: Pirates Rumble. Are ye ready to rumble?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 630
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GEFORCE GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: JRPR in short is an Action Arena fighting game. It is a local multiplayer shared screen game which needs at least 2 players locally to play. Players control different Pirates and compete to win! How do you win? Nice and easy, just push your enemies of the arena or figure out what do with your Pirate powers.
